title: The State of Data Streaming for Energy and Utilities in 2023
description: This blog post explores the state of data streaming for the energy and utilities industry in 2023. The evolution of utility infrastructure, energy distribution, customer services, and new business models requires real-time end-to-end visibility, reliable and …

title: BITmarkets Announces Public Sale of its Platform-Native Token BTMT
description: The public sale of BITmarkets Crypto Exchange’s platform-native token, BTMT, is scheduled to start on November 1, 2023. There are 300 million BTMT in total supply when it is deployed, of which 60 million (20%) are allocated for public sale. The token price wi…

title: Collaborate with third parties to ensure enterprise security
description: Third-party risk is a major threat today, as evidenced in numerous recent breaches. Organizations must work with partners to ensure their data is protected properly.
